bs-bookshelf-personal-books-page-prefix: The wikipage name under which personal books reside. Parameter $1 is the user name
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-bookstore-param-nod: Describes the API parameter which speficies a node for which a subchapter list should be provided.
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-bookstore-param-boo: Describes the API parameter which specifies the book for which a chapter list should be provided.
